metadata.name: Polarity
metadata.description:
Polarity is a poetic illustration of mathematicsâ€”an evocation of quicksilver in the complex plane. 

A generative art piece made with a fragment shader in GLSL. The original algorithm can run in real-time with infinite output.

Video 2160x2700
Duration 0:45
Single edition (1/1)

Darien Brito, March 2023
